attributes.action: Secure Asia Bibi (and family) safe exit from Pakistan, political asylum in UK.
attributes.additional_details: UK invests £465M of its £13.4B annual foreign aid budget in Pakistan. Leverage this and enduring diplomatic relations with Pakistan, to secure safe exit from Pakistan and political asylum in UK for Asia and her family.
attributes.background: Asia Bibi recently cleared of blasphemy in 2009, having served 8 years in prison, much of which in soliditary confinement. Since court decision nationwide protests in Pakistan, led government to put Asia on a Exit Control List to appease protestors. Her and her family’s lives are in grave danger.
